fields.name: hero-heading
fields.text:
Climate change, we get it...  
it’s a mess you don’t want to think about.

fields.name: MAINQ1-pre-title
fields.text: What do you think?

fields.name: MAINQ1-title
fields.text: Can we get ourselves out of this mess?

fields.name: MAINQ1-optimistic
fields.text: **Ok, so you're on board.** But how do we get there? Let's see if you're still convinced after reading what it will take.

fields.name: MAINQ1-pessimistic
fields.text: **Ok that's fair enough** — we'd be skeptical too — but let's see how you feel after reading what's involved in slashing Australia's emissions.

fields.name: SUBQ1-pre-title
SUBQ1-title
fields.text: So - what do you reckon our chances of doing this are?

fields.name: SUBQ1-optimistic
fields.text: Awesome! Electricity is the key to solving almost everything to do with climate change, so if you're on board with this then the rest becomes much easier.

fields.name: SUBQ1-pessimistic
fields.text: That's OK, electricity has been the big batteground for climate change. But remember, even if renewables just keep growing at the same rate, we'll still be at 61 per cent renewables by 2030.

fields.name: SUBQ1-optimistic-downpage
fields.text: [COMMENT FROM CLIMATEWORKS ABOUT IMPLICATIONS OF JUST THIS ONE TRANSFORMATION HAPPENING IN ELECTRICITY]

fields.name: SUBQ1-pessimistic-downpage
fields.text: [COMMENT FROM CLIMATE WORKS ABOUT WHAT COULD TURBOCHARGE TRANSITION IN ELECTRICITY]

fields.name: SUBQ2-pre-title
fields.text: What do you think?

fields.name: SUBQ2-title
fields.text: So - what do you reckon our chances of doing this are?

fields.name: SUBQ2-optimistic
fields.text: Your optimism is shared by farmers like Anika Molesworth, who is pushing for net zero by 2040.

fields.name: SUBQ2-pessimistic
fields.text: Fair enough, but there are plenty of farmers like Anika Molesworth, who is pushing for net zero by 2040, who disagree.

fields.name: SUBQ2-optimistic-downpage
fields.text: [COMMENT FROM CLIMATEWORKS ABOUT IMPLICATIONS OF JUST THIS ONE TRANSFORMATION HAPPENING IN AGRICULTURE]

fields.name: SUBQ2-pessimistic-downpage
fields.text: [COMMENT FROM CLIMATE WORKS ABOUT WHAT COULD TURBOCHARGE TRANSITION IN AGRICULTURE]

fields.name: SUBQ3-pre-title
fields.text: What do you think?

fields.name: SUBQ3-title
fields.text: So now you know how we quit fossil fuels in our transport system, can we do it?

fields.name: SUBQ3-optimistic
fields.text: THIS NEEDS SOME CONTENT

fields.name: SUBQ3-optimistic-downpage
fields.text: [COMMENT FROM CLIMATEWORKS ABOUT IMPLICATIONS OF JUST THIS ONE TRANSFORMATION HAPPENING IN TRANSPORT]

fields.name: SUBQ3-pessimistic
fields.text: Look with the tiny amount of EVs on the road, you're probably right to be skeptical things could change that quickly. But remember, in 2004 Blockbuster was the biggest name in video, and by 2010 it was bankrupt. Life comes at you fast.

fields.name: SUBQ3-pessimistic-downpage
fields.text: [COMMENT FROM CLIMATE WORKS ABOUT WHAT COULD TURBOCHARGE TRANSITION IN TRANSPORT]

fields.name: SUBQ4-pre-title
fields.text: What do you think?

fields.name: SUBQ4-title
fields.text: So - what do you reckon our chances of doing this are?

fields.name: SUBQ4-optimistic
fields.text: You're not alone in being optimistic. Two years ago, the Business Council said Labor's 45 per cent emissions reduction target would 'wreck the economy'. Earlier this month, they backflipped, saying 45-50 per cent reduction in renewables was "pragmatic, ambitious and will drive investment".

fields.name: SUBQ4-optimistic-downpage
fields.text: [COMMENT FROM CLIMATEWORKS ABOUT IMPLICATIONS OF JUST THIS ONE TRANSFORMATION HAPPENING IN INDUSTRY]

fields.name: SUBQ4-pessimistic
fields.text: Fair enough, but big business doesn't share your pessmism. Two years ago the Business Council said Labor's 45 per cent emissions reduction target would 'wreck the economy'. Earlier this month they backflipped, saying 45-50 per cent reduction in renewables was "pragmatic, ambitious and will drive investment".

fields.name: SUBQ4-pessimistic-downpage
fields.text: [COMMENT FROM CLIMATE WORKS ABOUT WHAT COULD TURBOCHARGE TRANSITION IN INDUSTRY]

fields.name: NOANSWER-nothing
fields.text: You didn't answer any of the questions but  maybe you're curious how the rest of the audience felt.

fields.name: NOANSWER-some-subq
fields.text: You didn't tell us whether you thought we could get out of this mess.

fields.name: INCOMPLETE-optimistic
fields.text: You thought we could do this, but didn't answer any questions. Here's what the audience thinks:
fields.Explanation: answered top question positive, didn't answer any secondary

fields.name: INCOMPLETE-pessimistic
fields.text: You thought we couldn't get out of this mess. We're not sure if that's still the case because you didn't answer any other questions but here's what the audience thinks:
fields.Explanation: answered top question negative, didn't answer any secondary

fields.name: INCOMPLETE-no-challenges
fields.text: While we don’t know if you’re convinced by any of the challenges, here’s what the audience thought:

fields.name: LEVEL3-yes-4-optimistic
fields.text: Looks like you were right to be optimistic. If we can do all of this, Australia really could become a leader in the global transformation.

fields.name: LEVEL3-yes-4-pessimistic
fields.text: You were pretty pessimistic at the start, but it looks like you've changed your mind. If we can do all this, Australia really could become a leader in the global transformation.

fields.name: LEVEL3-yes-4-noanswer
fields.text: But it looks like you reckon we could pull this off, and if we can, Australia really could become a leader in the global transformation.

fields.name: LEVEL3-yes-3-optimistic
fields.text: Look even if you've got a few doubts whether we can do all of this by 2030, achieving most of these challenges would put us well on the way to become a leader in the transformation.

fields.name: LEVEL3-yes-3-pessimistic
fields.text: You were pretty pessimistic at the start, but it looks like you've changed your mind. And even if you've got a few doubts whether we can do all of this by 2030, achieving most of these challenges would put us well on the way to become a leader in the transformation.

fields.name: LEVEL3-yes-3-noanswer
fields.text: But even if you've got a few doubts whether we can do all of this by 2030, achieving most of these challenges would put us well on the way to become a leader in the transformation.

fields.name: LEVEL3-yes-2-optimistic
fields.text: Look even if you've got a few doubts whether we can do all of this by 2030, solving climate change isn't like a switch you flick. Every bit of CO2 we keep out of the atmosphere makes a difference, and transforming any of these sectors would be huge progress.

fields.name: LEVEL3-yes-2-pessimistic
fields.text: You were pretty pessimistic at the start and it looks like you've still got some doubts. We get it, it’s a big problem, but we don’t have to solve it all now. Solving climate change isn't like a switch you flick. Every bit of CO2 we keep out of the atmosphere makes a difference, and transforming any of these sectors would be huge progress.

fields.name: LEVEL3-yes-2-noanswer
fields.text: Look even if you've got a few doubts whether we can do all of this by 2030, solving climate change isn't like a switch you flick. Every bit of CO2 we keep out of the atmosphere makes a difference, and transforming any of these sectors would be huge progress.

fields.name: LEVEL3-yes-1-optimistic
fields.text: You were optimistic about Australia's chances, but maybe you're not as confident now you know what's required. We get it, it’s a big problem, but we don’t have to solve it all now, solving climate change isn't like a switch you flick. Every bit of CO2 we keep out of the atmosphere makes a difference, and transforming just one of these sectors would be huge progress.

fields.name: LEVEL3-yes-1-pessimistic
fields.text: Look even if you've got a doubts whether we can do all of this by 2030, solving climate change isn't like a switch you flick. Every bit of CO2 we keep out of the atmosphere makes a difference, and transforming just one sector would be huge progress.

fields.name: LEVEL3-yes-1-noanswer
fields.text: Look even if you've got a doubts whether we can do all of this by 2030, solving climate change isn't like a switch you flick. Every bit of CO2 we keep out of the atmosphere makes a difference, and transforming just one of these sectors would be huge progress.

fields.name: LEVEL3-none-optimistic
fields.text: You weren't convinced by anything, but hopefully you're still optimistic Australia can still put this off, and there are plenty of things we could do to speed things up.

fields.name: LEVEL3-none-pessimistic
fields.text: You were pretty pessimistic at the start, and it looks like nothing you've read has changed your mind. But there are plenty of things Australia could do to speed things up.

fields.name: LEVEL3-none-noanswer
fields.text: It doesn't look like anything you read convinced you this was possible. But there are plenty of things Australia could do to speed things up.

fields.name: SELFVAUS-more
fields.text: [ANSWER DEPENDENT ON HOW AUDIENCE ANSWERED CHALLENGE QUESTIONS] You’re more optimistic we can solve these challenges than most of our readers, but even if we just reduce emissions in the areas they’re convinced by, we’d still be on track for the most ambitious Paris agreements.

fields.name: SELFVAUS-same
fields.text: [ANSWER DEPENDENT ON HOW AUDIENCE ANSWERED CHALLENGE QUESTIONS]Most people who read this story agree with you.

fields.name: SELFVAUS-less
fields.text: [ANSWER DEPENDENT ON HOW AUDIENCE ANSWERED CHALLENGE QUESTIONS] Your fellow Australians are more optimistic than you. They’re convinced we can do X, which would keep us on track for the most ambitious Paris agreement B.
